title: Zipp Announces New 353NSW and 303 SW Wheels and Aero Goodyear Tires
content:
Ever in the pursuit of speed and efficiency, Zipp announces a host of new wheelsets and accompanying tires to complement the new rims perfectly.

353 NSW Speed of Light

Zipp’s 353 NSW is the first SRAM AXS connected wheel, offering in-wheel tire pressure monitoring on our most advanced and lightest rim design. The 353 NSW is Zipp’s first SRAM AXS-connected wheelset. Designed for racers, it’s a lightweight climber’s wheel that comes with ceramic bearings and Zipp’s most advanced rim technology for impressive durability and aero performance. The 353 NSW rim seamlessly integrates the Zipp AXS Wheel Sensor for accurate on-bike tire-pressure monitoring. It allows you to monitor and analyze tire pressure in real-time without an external device mounted to the valve stem. Before you ride, check your pressure immediately; green light means good to go. During the ride, monitor pressure to dial in your ideal setting and detect issues early.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 700c
  • Tubeless Straight Side (TSS) hookless
  • Tubeless Tire Only, option to run inner tubes with threaded valve
  • 25mm Inner width
  • Weight (g): 1,310
  • First integrated, connected SRAM AXS wheel with Zipp AXS Wheel Sensor, with ability to monitor pressure with specially designed tube
  • ZR1 SL hubset with ceramic bearings
  • Optimized for 30mm tires
  • Sawtooth rim with Hyperfoil nodes and HexFin ABLC dimple pattern for top aero and crosswind-stability performance with an undulating rim depth.
  • XDR or SRAM/Shimano driver bodies.
  • Campagnolo driver body sold separately
  • Lifetime Warranty

303SW Modern Classic

Zipp 303 SW offers performance on all roads with SRAM AXS-connected in-wheel tire pressure monitoring. The 303 SW rim internally integrates the Zipp AXS Wheel Sensor for accurate on-bike tire-pressure monitoring. The 303 SW’s 40mm deep rim design takes design cues from the gravel-specific 303 XPLR to utilize a wide rim design for high aero efficiency and low rolling resistance on a wide tire platform designed for modern riding at lower tire pressures. The wide-rim stance also features less tire deflection for reduced rolling resistance.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • 700c
  • Tubeless Straight Side (TSS) hookless
  • Tubeless Tire Only, option to run inner tubes with threaded valve
  • Rim Inside Width 25mm
  • Weight (g): 1440
  • First integrated, connected SRAM AXS wheel with Zipp AXS Wheel Sensor; ability to use sensor with compatible tube
  • ZR1 hubset with stainless steel bearings.
  • Optimized for 30 to 35mm tires
  • XDR or SRAM/Shimano driver bodies
  • Campagnolo driver body sold separately
  • Lifetime Warranty

GOODYEAR VECTOR R XPLR

Engineered to redefine performance, the Goodyear Vector R XPLR tire is designed specifically for Zipp’s revolutionary 303 XPLR wheel. The 40mm Vector R XPLR tire is perfectly optimized for Zipp’s 32mm tubeless straight sidewall (hookless) rim, offering unmatched aerodynamics, superior comfort, and precision handling—empowering you to dominate the toughest roads with confidence. With its advanced construction and the unique combination of a supple 120 TPI casing and lightweight R:Shield & M:Wall protection layers.

FEATURES

  • Short-Ply construction and 120 TPI casing
  • R:Shield anti-puncture breaker belt
  • M:Wall sidewall protection helps prevent cuts and reduces the chance of getting pinch flats
  • Tubeless Ready with Dual Angle Bead for easy set up
  • Designed to measure 40mm on Zipp’s 32mm TSS rim
  • Weight: 440g

GOODYEAR EAGLE F1 R Z29 AERO

Designed exclusively for Zipp’s 23mm TSS rim, this 29mm road race tire doesn’t just meet the standard; it sets a new one. Seamlessly integrating with Zipp’s 404 and 454 wheels, the Eagle F1 R Z29 Aero transforms your ride with unparalleled aerodynamic efficiency and ultra-low rolling resistance. Engineered with Goodyear’s cutting-edge Dynamic: UHP compound, a lightweight 180 TPI casing, and a proven R:Shield anti-puncture belt. It’s designed to measure 29mm on Zipp’s 23mm TSS rim.

FEATURES

  • Revolutionary Construction Short-Ply 180 TPI casing for unmatched performance
  • Enhanced Durability R:Shield anti-puncture belt for worry-free rides
  • Optimized Traction Lightweight tread cap with a textured pattern for high-speed cornering
  • Dynamic:UHP Compound Ultra-low rolling resistance, superior grip, and extended lifespan
  • Tubeless Ready Dual Angle Bead for seamless setup
  • Precision Fit Designed to measure 29mm on Zipp’s 23mm TSS rim
  • Weighs just 270g

Find all the info and more updates over at Zipp.

The post Zipp Announces New 353NSW and 303 SW Wheels and Aero Goodyear Tires appeared first on The Radavist.
author: spencer harding
